1065482540889235457.text:
There is this thing called “weather” and this different thing called “climate.”

But @realDonaldTrump, you are such an incurious, scientifically illiterate fool you wouldn’t understand that.https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1065400254151954432 …

1065700666092462082.text: Being degrading makes you look as dumb as Trump is dumb.

1065489562175238145.text: I extra search @Google and found a very nice explanation of #weather and #climate from @NASA, USA, thank you NASA for writing auch a good article about this topichttps://go.nasa.gov/2DR3UHN

1065523643617341440.text: Climate breakdown means loss of climate stability. With more energy trapped in the atmosphere, weather extremes are greater and more frequent. A sudden freeze is as much confirmation of climate breakdown as record forest fires and long droughts. Can’t buy your way out of it.

1065483031907954689.text: Maybe if we described it to him that there's thing called 'the economy' and this different thing called 'bankruptcy', and they aren't actually tied together.  That he should be able to relate to.  Several times.

1065709813055680512.text:
I assure you, his ignorance is greater than anything to which I aspire.

Tell me, how should one react to statements such as his here, knowing that he is scientifically illiterate and further has never expressed any desire to learn?

1065722076152164352.text: In ways that don’t descend to his level. I get it, you’re inclusive of all skin colors except for orange heads & you’re accepting of all body types except for those that include tiny hands. As a real liberal I separate myself from fake liberals who act as dumb as Trump acts dumb.

1065760221274943488.text: Thanks...but I asked what you would do, not what you wouldn’t do.

1065761706855591936.text: I would criticize his points by teaching refutations instead of making fun of him.

1065772027619897345.text: Give me an example WRT the tweet to which I replied to him.

1065761908660338689.text: Because, you know, bullies like Donald Trump make fun of people.

1065777641704185857.text: Saying he is incurious and scientifically illiterate is a statement of fact.

1065963385689440258.text: “You’re such a fool you wouldn’t understand [what I’ve just explained in simple terms].” That’s a very disingenuous way of speaking, and it makes you look as dumb as Trump looks dumb. Look, we agree that Trump is dumb. We only disagree that he is making you act as dumb as him.

1065810585143660545.text: It is pointing out the obvious in order to make fun of him. It does nothing to help those who might be duped by him or might not know better.

1065962432680640513.text: Nobody is incurious. Everybody is curious. Calling someone aloof is a way of making fun of them.

1066024530970329088.text: Saying Trump is a fool and ignorant is just stating a fact and is perfectly ok. The “we go high when they go low” doesn’t work in practice. You don’t go far by bringing a knife to a gun fight.

1065825396678000641.text: Again, you have offered no concrete suggestion.

1065962065649643522.text: Sure I did. You’re in denial. Self-deception -> rationalization -> justification -> self-deception -> repeat. This is role reversal: Gen Y/Millennials are telling Baby Boomers to live their values instead of act like their enemies. “Stop being a bully, stop making fun of people.”

1065828440081866754.text: I'll tell you a secret. Trump intentionally phrases things the way he does and it serves a dual purpose. For one, his position becomes easily understandable and relatable and two, doing so triggers the hell out of the left for being simple and ambiguous. It's highly effective.

1065962850915663872.text: In other words, be a Carl Sagan instead of a Donald Trump. You’re being a Donald Trump.

1066048827570835456.text: I respect that. And that is an actionable thing.

1066049460881346560.text: Speaking of Sagan, remember his attacks on scientific illiteracy. His bit in Cosmos regarding those who believe in astrology was classic.

1066050113980833793.text: Sagan converted me to atheism without ever making fun of Christians. I became unconverted from atheism by people who made fun of Christians.
